venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador. Starring and directed by Ben Affleck.
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1024648/

There's a 7:00 show at Blackstone Valley Cinema. Let's meet in the lobby at 6:30. That way, we can get good seats for everyone. If you need to reach me, my cell phone is 508-981-0455.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Argo
